mn74:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate sūkarakhatāyaṃ.
mn74:3.3: Atha kho dīghanakho paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn74:3.5: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
mn74:3.6: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho dīghanakho paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn74:3.10: ‘sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī’ti, esāpi te diṭṭhi nakkhamatī”ti?
mn74:3.11: “Esā ce me, bho gotama, diṭṭhi khameyya, taṃpassa tādisameva, taṃpassa tādisamevā”ti. “
mn74:3.12: Ato kho te, aggivessana, bahū hi bahutarā lokasmiṃ ye evamāhaṃsu:
mn74:3.14: Te tañceva diṭṭhiṃ nappajahanti aññañca diṭṭhiṃ upādiyanti.
mn74:3.15: Ato kho te, aggivessana, tanū hi tanutarā lokasmiṃ ye evamāhaṃsu:
mn74:3.17: Te tañceva diṭṭhiṃ pajahanti aññañca diṭṭhiṃ na upādiyanti.
mn74:3.24: Tatraggivessana, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn74:3.25: ‘sabbaṃ me khamatī’ti tesamayaṃ diṭṭhi sārāgāya santike, saññogāya santike, abhinandanāya santike, ajjhosānāya santike, upādānāya santike;
mn74:3.26: tatraggivessana ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn74:3.27: ‘sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī’ti tesamayaṃ diṭṭhi asārāgāya santike, asaññogāya santike, anabhinandanāya santike, anajjhosānāya santike, anupādānāya santike”ti.
mn74:4.1: Evaṃ vutte, dīghanakho paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn74:4.2: “ukkaṃseti me bhavaṃ gotamo diṭṭhigataṃ, samukkaṃseti me bhavaṃ gotamo diṭṭhigatan”ti.
mn74:5.3: Yā hi tesaṃ khamati sāyaṃ diṭṭhi sārāgāya santike, saññogāya santike, abhinandanāya santike, ajjhosānāya santike, upādānāya santike;
mn74:5.4: yā hi tesaṃ nakkhamati sāyaṃ diṭṭhi asārāgāya santike, asaññogāya santike, anabhinandanāya santike, anajjhosānāya santike, anupādānāya santike.
mn74:5.5: Tatraggivessana, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino:
mn74:5.6: ‘sabbaṃ me khamatī’ti tattha viññū puriso iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn74:5.8: sabbaṃ me khamatīti, imañce ahaṃ diṭṭhiṃ thāmasā parāmāsā abhinivissa vohareyyaṃ—
mn74:5.11: yo cāyaṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃvādī evaṃdiṭṭhi—
mn74:5.12: sabbaṃ me nakkhamatīti, yo cāyaṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃvādī evaṃdiṭṭhi—
mn74:5.13: ekaccaṃ me khamati, ekaccaṃ me nakkhamatīti—
mn74:5.15: Iti viggahe sati vivādo, vivāde sati vighāto, vighāte sati vihesā’.
mn74:5.16: Iti so viggahañca vivādañca vighātañca vihesañca attani sampassamāno tañceva diṭṭhiṃ pajahati aññañca diṭṭhiṃ na upādiyati.
mn74:5.17: Evametāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, evametāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ paṭinissaggo hoti.

mn74:6.9: ekaccaṃ me khamati ekaccaṃ me nakkhamatīti—

mn74:8.1: Ayaṃ kho panaggivessana, kāyo rūpī cātumahābhūtiko mātāpettikasambhavo odanakummāsūpacayo aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammo, aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato suññato anattato samanupassitabbo.
mn74:8.2: Tassimaṃ kāyaṃ aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato suññato anattato samanupassato yo kāyasmiṃ kāyachando kāyasneho kāyanvayatā sā pahīyati.
mn74:9.2: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
mn74:9.3: Yasmiṃ, aggivessana, samaye sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, neva tasmiṃ samaye dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, na adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti;
mn74:9.5: Yasmiṃ, aggivessana, samaye dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, neva tasmiṃ samaye sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, na adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti;
mn74:9.7: Yasmiṃ, aggivessana, samaye adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, neva tasmiṃ samaye sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, na dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti;
mn74:9.9: Sukhāpi kho, aggivessana, vedanā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā;
mn74:9.10: dukkhāpi kho, aggivessana, vedanā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā;
mn74:9.11: adukkhamasukhāpi kho, aggivessana, vedanā aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā.
mn74:9.12: Evaṃ passaṃ, aggivessana, sutavā ariyasāvako sukhāyapi vedanāya nibbindati, dukkhāyapi vedanāya nibbindati, adukkhamasukhāyapi vedanāya nibbindati;
mn74:9.15: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
mn74:9.16: Evaṃ vimuttacitto kho, aggivessana, bhikkhu na kenaci saṃvadati, na kenaci vivadati, yañca loke vuttaṃ tena voharati, aparāmasan”ti.
mn74:10.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato piṭṭhito ṭhito hoti bhagavantaṃ bījayamāno.
mn74:10.3: “tesaṃ tesaṃ kira no bhagavā dhammānaṃ abhiññā pahānamāha, tesaṃ tesaṃ kira no sugato dhammānaṃ abhiññā paṭinissaggamāhā”ti.
mn74:10.4: Iti hidaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa paṭisañcikkhato anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci.
mn74:10.5: Dīghanakhassa pana paribbājakassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi:
mn74:10.7: Atha kho dīghanakho paribbājako diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo tiṇṇavicikiccho vigatakathaṃkatho vesārajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusāsane bhagavantaṃ etadavoca: “
mn74:10.8: abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama.
mn74:10.9: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya:
mn74:10.11: evameva kho bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
mn74:10.12: Esāhaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṃghañca.
mn74:10.13: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
